title: 今天下午就做这个调查

conversations.english: I think that the company retreat should be in the mountains this year.我认为今年公司搬迁的选址应该在山上。
conversations.chinese: 我认为今年公司搬迁的选址应该在山上。
conversations.reply_english: What a great idea!不错的主意！

conversations.english: The Mountains would be a great place for the company retreat.这座山会是个很棒的公司搬迁地址。
conversations.chinese: 这座山会是个很棒的公司搬迁地址。
conversations.reply_english: That's a wonderful choice.真是个不错的选择。

title: 你能跟我一起去书店吗

conversations.english: Would you go to the bookstore with me?你能跟我一起去书店吗？
conversations.chinese: 你能跟我一起去书店吗？
conversations.reply_english: It sounds a good idea. Let’s go.听起来不错。走吧。

conversations.english: So, are we all behind this new project?这么说大家都支持这个新案子了？
conversations.chinese: 这么说大家都支持这个新案子了？
conversations.reply_english: I'm in favor of Maggie.我同意麦琪。

conversations.english: I feel like going for a drink, it's been a long day.我想去喝一杯，今天忙了一整天。
conversations.chinese: 我想去喝一杯，今天忙了一整天。
conversations.reply_english: Great idea! Peter, I could use the drink.好主意，Peter,我也想要喝一杯。
conversations.reply_chinese: 好主意，Peter,我也想要喝一杯。

conversations.english: Could you help me prepare for my presentation on Friday?你能帮我准备周五的发言吗？
conversations.chinese: 你能帮我准备周五的发言吗？
conversations.reply_english: I would love to help you prepare for your presentation.我很愿意帮你准备。
